Title: An Engineer's Best Friend
Description:
Hey sparky, have you seen my...

Err... maybe hand me the...

That's it--I think it's time we start keeping a few more tools around this shop, you know what I'm saying?
ObjectivesText: Craft 2 Draconium Encased Samophlanges for Clinkyclick Shatterboom in Valdrakken.
RewardText:
Finally! It's like trying to craft with two hands tied behind my back without those things.

Here, take these schematics. I bet there's something in there you didn't know.
